title: Game Dev at Electronic Arts (Through Globant)
description: I've been working in one of the most popular game dev companies since January 2023 in Madden NFL, one of the most popular sport game of all time.

title: Main game dev at Rather Labs
description: Short-term contract with a NFT & Blockchain company where I worked as a Main Game Dev, creating a street fighter-like NFT game.

title: Lead game dev at Agonalea Games
description: My first professional experience as a Game Dev. After a year working in this company, I Led a team of developers in the development of Rhythm Realms, one of the selected Google Play Games Fund program

title: Full-stack web dev at Cloodie
description: My first professional experience in a telemedicine software company. Stack: Vue.js, Node.Js, PHP

title: Start University - UNQ
description: I Began studying software development at National University of Quilmes

title: Game dev at Deliver Games
description: My first indie game dev experience. I worked with college buddies in this company. We developed mobile games for small clients.

title: My first Job
description: My first job as a teacher in a school at Instituto San Juan Bautista.

title: My Birth
description: I was born the 2nd of October 1992
